trafsim.gui
Class RoadAreaGUI

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  trafsim.gui.RoadAreaGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class RoadAreaGUI
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

Manage the draw of a road area. For now, there is only one road in a road area.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

RoadAreaGUI

public RoadAreaGUI(IDM model)
Default constructor. Set the size of the road area and draw a black border. Create a new carList and a new road then initialize attributes with this new instances.

Parameters:
model - The model that should be used

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent arg0)
Automatically called by a Timer. Updates the cars's velocities, release semaphores then repaint the GUI.

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener

updateRoad

public void updateRoad()
Update cars in the road. Actually, it calls the updateCars() method in class Road
